listitem.para: This command "pastes" the image that was BITCUT into the bitmap index specified by BITINDEX. If BITINDEX is 0, then BITPASTE will paste the contents of the clipboard. The bitmap is pasted to the location of the turtle, with the turtle being the lower-left corner.

programlisting.userinput: SETPENSIZE [2 2] REPEAT 72 [CIRCLE2 100 SETPENCOLOR (LIST REPCOUNT*3 0 0) RIGHT 5] PENUP SETXY -50 -50 BITCUT 100 100 CLEARSCREEN PENUP REPEAT 36 [FORWARD 150 BITPASTE BACK 150 RIGHT 10]
